title: following threads on typophile
content: does anybody know if there is a way to follow threads without posting in them?
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content: Have you tried the little RSS link located beneath every post? Subscribe to that and you can get the latest responses to any particular thread.

also, this is an easy way to see what's been going on lately:

[http://typophile.com/tracker](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020064759/http:/typophile.com/tracker "http://typophile.com/tracker")

@bemerx25 - i'm not really rss feed reading kinda guy... but thanks for the idea!

@aluminum - thanks!

In Firefox you can save the rss link as a "Live Bookmark", which creates a folder with the updated entries.

It's still a rss solution, but slightly more manageable then using a full-fledged reader.

@ aluminum,

How do you get to that link from the main page?
As things stand - you don't. You can make a bookmark however!
